mapper.select: select clientid, orgid, createtime, blockpeers, clientversion, ipfspeers from fbsys.clientterm where clientid= #{clientid}
select clientid, orgid, createtime, blockpeers, clientversion, ipfspeers from fbsys.clientterm limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into fbsys.clientterm(clientid, orgid, createtime, blockpeers, clientversion, ipfspeers) values (#{clientid}, #{orgid}, #{createtime}, #{blockpeers}, #{clientversion}, #{ipfspeers})

insert into fbsys.clientterm(clientid, orgid, createtime, blockpeers, clientversion, ipfspeers) values
(#{entity.clientid}, #{entity.orgid}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.blockpeers}, #{entity.clientversion}, #{entity.ipfspeers})

insert into fbsys.clientterm(clientid, orgid, createtime, blockpeers, clientversion, ipfspeers) values
(#{entity.clientid}, #{entity.orgid}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.blockpeers}, #{entity.clientversion}, #{entity.ipfspeers})
on duplicate key update clientid = values(clientid) , orgid = values(orgid) , createtime = values(createtime) , blockpeers = values(blockpeers) , clientversion = values(clientversion) , ipfspeers = values(ipfspeers)
mapper.update:
update fbsys.clientterm
clientid = #{clientid},
orgid = #{orgid},
createtime = #{createtime},
blockpeers = #{blockpeers},
clientversion = #{clientversion},
ipfspeers = #{ipfspeers},
where clientid= #{clientid}
